io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization

Interface AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider

    public interface AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
    Provides an authorization redirect URL.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String resolveAuthorizationRedirectUrl(io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest<?> request) 

    • Method Detail

      • resolveAuthorizationRedirectUrl

        java.lang.String resolveAuthorizationRedirectUrl(io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest<?> request)
        Parameters:
        request - the Original request prior redirect.
        Returns:
        A URL to redirect the user to the OpenID Provider authorization endpoint.
